description: Notifications for ePO. Rule conditions have been triggered.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD EPO-MIB::epoAlertingRuleTrap EPO-MIB::NotificationRuleName s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::SiteNodeName s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::BranchNodePath s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::ConfiguredProductFamilies s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::ConfiguredEventCategories s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::ConfiguredThreatName s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::FirstEventTime s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::EventIDs s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::EventDescriptions s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::ReceivedNumComputers s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::ReceivedNumEvents s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::ReceivedProductFamilies s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::ReceivedEventCategories s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::ReceivedThreatNames s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::SourceComputers s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::AffectedComputerIPs s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::AffectedComputerNames s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::AffectedObjects s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::AdditionalInformation s EXAMPLE EPO-MIB::TimeNotificationSent s EXAMPLE

description: The name of the rule as it appears on the UI.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::NotificationRuleName

description: The name of the site under which this rule is defined.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::SiteNodeName

description: The path from the site level which shows the node at which this rule is defined.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::BranchNodePath

description: The product families configured to trigger this rule.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::ConfiguredProductFamilies

description: The event categories configured to trigger this rule.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::ConfiguredEventCategories

description: The threat text (virus name) that this rule is looking for.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::ConfiguredThreatName

description: The timestamp of the first event received by this rule.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::FirstEventTime

description: The actual EventID(s) received by this rule.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::EventIDs

description: The text associated with the event id(s) which triggered this rule.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::EventDescriptions

description: The number of computers which triggered this event.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::ReceivedNumComputers

description: The number of events which triggered this event.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::ReceivedNumEvents

description: The actual product families from which events were received.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::ReceivedProductFamilies

description: The actual event categories for which events were received.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::ReceivedEventCategories

description: The name of the threats/virii which were actually detected.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::ReceivedThreatNames

description: The source IP address(es) which caused an event to be generated.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::SourceComputers

description: The IP address of the system(s) that were the target of an attack.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::AffectedComputerIPs

description: The name of the computer(s) that were the target of an attack.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::AffectedComputerNames

description: The name of the computer(s) that were the target of an attack.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::AffectedObjects

description: The name of the computer(s) that were the target of an attack.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::AdditionalInformation

description: The time that this notification was generated.
variables.name: EPO-MIB::TimeNotificationSent
